Key Match Events: Tunisia beat São Tomé e Principe 4-0
Malawi won against Liberia by a 1-0 margin
Equatorial Guinea won against Namibia by a 1-0 margin
Ghana broke Madagascar’s resistance in the 96th minute to win 1-0
Pre-Game Insights: Tunisia, whom Malawi Flames meet on Tuesday at Bingu Stadium, are Group H favourites
Miscellaneous Highlights: The 2026 World Cup finals will have 48 participating countries instead of the conventional 32
The top team from each group after Match Day 10 shall earn an automatic qualification for the 2026 World Cup finals
Others: Mohamed Salah scored four goals to lead Egypt past Djibouti 6-0
Nigeria were held to a shock 1-1 home draw by Lesotho in Group C
